dmca.title: US Title 17, Chapter 12 Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Bob Badour [mailto:support@3283291.ca] 
Sent: Tuesday, January 03, 2006 12:27 PM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: US Title 17, Chapter 12 Copyright Infringement

January 3, 2006

Attn Agent for Notice:

George Poletes
The Planet Internet Services
1333 Stemmons Fwy., Ste 110
Dallas, Texas  75207
Phone: 214-782-7800
Fax: 214-782-7756
Email: legal-response@theplanet.com

Software pirates have set up a website on one of your servers at
http://www.pogohideout.com/

In particular, UltraCracker 3.2.2, Alpha Cracker v. 2.9.1 and other software
marketed and distributed by the site exist solely to circumvent the
technical measures included by 3283291 Canada Limited in various software
products, including but not limited to Dottie's Dauber, World Class Solo,
Flinkin Pharoah, Auto Pilot and others for the purposes of protecting
3283291 Canada Limited's exclusive copyright in these works. 
This is a flagrant violation of US Title 17, Chapter 12, Sections 1201,
1203 and 1204 of the US Legal Code.

Please remove this illegal content from your servers.

The entire content of the forum at http://www.pogohideout.com/ either
directly infringes the copyrights of 3283291 Canada Limited and other
software producers or exists solely to traffic in technologies for
circumventing the technical measures preventing unauthorized access to
protected works.

I draw your attention, in particular, to US Title 17, Chapter 12, Section
1201, paragraph (a)(2).

I represent that I have the authority to bind 3283291 Canada Limited, that I
am the authorised representative of the corporation and that the corporation
has an exclusive copyright infringed by the content distributed via your
site. I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner
complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the
law. I state under penalty of perjury that the above stated facts are
accurate and correct.

You may contact me at:
Bob Badour
3283291 Canada Limited
38883 Western Rd - Rte 2
Alberton RR 1, PE, CA  C0B 1B0
Phone: 902-853-3874
Email: support@3283291.ca

For the purposes of Title 17, Section 512, this communication shall be
deemed written communication and my signature below in conjunction with the
technical means to identify the source of this correspondence shall be
deemed an electronic signature sufficient to identify me and to bind  me.

Bob Badour
President, 3283291 Canada Limited
